What's hiding in your walls?

99.44% of all DFW area homes will be infested with termites or other wood destroying insects at some point in the first 20 years of its life…

Are you at risk of a bug infestation?

Find out before your house becomes their house!

What we do

HOME SAFE TERMITE & PEST COMPANY provides its customers with complete residential inspection and treatment for all types of wood destroying insects, from formosan and dry wood termites to carpenter ants, powerpost beetles, & wood boring bees.

Our team of expert WDI inspectors and treatment specialists are fully trained and certified by the Texas Department of Agriculture Structural Pest Control Boaard. We bring our expertise to bear at your home to find wood destroying insects in your walls, cabinets & furniture. Once we find them, we eradicate them, and, through our exclusive warranty program, guarantee theyâ€™ll never return.

Our 3-Step Process:

  • Step 1

    If any wood destroying insects are found, we use safe-for-your-family insecticides proven to kill not just the bugs we see, but the nests, too. And keep them from coming back!

  • Step 2

    Our inspectors thoroughly search every square inch of your home, inside and out for signs of infestation, either current or past.

  • Step 3

    Our OPTIONAL extended warranty guarantees that your home will stay bug free and includes a quarterly re-inspection & additional treatment, as needed for the life of the warranty.
